General_Description: '''Top Source of Problems''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: On a [[message board]], Kassandra found a note about a contract: "[[Athens]]' [[Athenian army|military]] will be in disarray if its [[Nation Leader|leaders]] are dealt with."
Section_Outcome: Kassandra slew Athenian State Leaders all over Greece, gaining rewards for doing this.
Section_Behind_the_scenes: This very same contract appears also under the names [[Champions of Athena]] and [[Leading Forces]].
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''
